welcomeMessage: Welcome to a journey of knowledge to enlighten the mind and soul.
rulesScrollPrompt: You must scroll to the end to continue.
rulesReadButton: I have read the rules, let's play!

musafir.title: Musafir Mode (Solo)
musafir.description: Play questions until you lose your 3 lives. Go for your personal best!

majlis.title: Majlis Mode (Group)
majlis.description: Compete in turns with 2-6 players. Each has 3 lives. The game ends when only one player remains or the rounds are completed.

difficulty.title: Difficulty and Time
difficulty.easy: Basic facts and well-known names. (30 seconds)

lifelines.title: Lifeline Mechanics
lifelines.inventory: Each player has their own inventory per game.

fiftyFifty.title: 50/50 (The Discernment)
fiftyFifty.description: Removes 2 incorrect answers. You have 2 uses per game.

extraTime.title: Extra Time (Sabr)
extraTime.description: Adds 15 seconds to the timer. You have 2 uses per game.

skip.title: Skip Question (Hijrah)
skip.description: Moves to the next question without losing lives. You have 1 use per game (only in Medium and Hard difficulty).

musafirMode.title: Musafir Mode
musafirMode.description: A solo journey of knowledge. How far can you go?

majlisMode.title: Majlis Mode
majlisMode.description: Gather your family and friends for a group challenge.

category.generalDescription: Explore revelation, basic Fiqh, Islamic history, and the pillars of faith.
category.mixDescription: A random challenge from all categories for the chosen difficulty.
